# [Interview #20: Stories from the LOC Signing Tour, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=20#2)

#### Grey Culberson

Does RJ religiously read the WOT newsletter?

#### Robert Jordan

Absolutely. At least when I get it.
